articles.description: Last night, the first 60 pieces from his prestigious painting collection, which featured pieces by Cezanne and Seurat, went under the hammer at Christie's Rockefeller Center in New York.
articles.content:
An art collection owned by Microsoft founder Paul Allen last night sold at auction for $1.5 billion- setting a new record.

articles.title: Aaron Carter obituary - The Guardian
articles.description: Singer and actor who found fame as a child star with a contagiously commercial mix of pop-rap and ballads that sold in the millions
articles.content: Fame at a young age is often more of a curse than a blessing, and surviving it is not easy, said the veteran songwriter Diane Warren after news broke of the death of Aaron Carter. Carter, who has bee… [+5590 chars]
